cast.name: 史蒂文·安东尼·劳伦斯 Steven Anthony Lawrence

introduction: Present day Echo Park, newly licensed therapist Riley Addison relapses after 7 months of sobriety. She admits to her alcoholism and to her exhaustion aiding a diverse collection of clients who are looking to her for direction and guidance. With assistance from Molly Banks, the office receptionist, and her agoraphobic neighbor, Sam, she might just stay sober. But an old friend from Rehab like Selena, an aging model with young habits, will pressure her to let loose from her responsibilities and pick up a drink again. The TV show is a Dark comedy about addiction, recovery, and friendship. We explore all the character's journey into self awareness and self love.
